text: Malik Isaac Taylor (November 20, 1970 - March 22, 2016), better known by his stage name Phife Dawg (or simply Phife), was an American rapper.Phife Dawg: His Name Is Mutty Ranks HipHopDX. Accessed on November 24, 2010. == Career == He was a member of the group A Tribe Called Quest with high school classmates Q-Tip and Ali Shaheed Muhammad (and for a short time Jarobi White). He was also known as the "Five Foot Assassin" and "The Five Footer", because he stood at . == Death == Taylor died on March 22, 2016 due to complications of diabetes at the age of 45. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Phife Dawg
